mapper.insert: insert into t_contract (contract_id, contract_code, serial_no, title, sign_date, type, contract_status, approval_status,approval_process, cycle, pay_type, party_a, party_a_principal, party_b, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date,approval_start_date, approval_end_date, summary, terms, file_url, group_id,company_id, is_draft, summation, create_id, create_time, effective_time, termination_time, attachment1_name, attachment1, attachment2_name, attachment2, attachment3_name, attachment3, attachment4_name, attachment4, attachment5_name, attachment5 ) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{contractStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{approvalProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyAPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyBPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{approvalStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approvalEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDraft,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{summation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{terminationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attachment1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment4Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment5Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_contract set contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, contract_status = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, approval_process = #{approvalProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cycle = #{cycle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a = #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a_principal = #{partyAPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b = #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b_principal = #{partyBPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approval_start_date = #{approvalStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approval_end_date = #{approvalEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terms = #{terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_draft = #{isDraft,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, summation = #{summation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, termination_time = #{terminationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attachment1_name = #{attachment1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment1 = #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment2_name = #{attachment2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment2 = #{attachment2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment3_name = #{attachment3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment3 = #{attachment3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment4_name = #{attachment4Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment4 = #{attachment4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment5_name = #{attachment5Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment5 = #{attachment5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select contract_id, contract_code, serial_no, title, sign_date, type, contract_status, approval_status,approval_process, cycle, pay_type, party_a, party_a_principal, party_b, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date, approval_start_date, approval_end_date, summary, terms, file_url, group_id,company_id, is_draft, summation, create_id, create_time, effective_time, termination_time, attachment1_name, attachment1, attachment2_name, attachment2, attachment3_name, attachment3, attachment4_name, attachment4, attachment5_name, attachment5 from t_contract where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select contract_id, contract_code, serial_no, title, sign_date, type, contract_status,approval_status, approval_process, cycle, pay_type, party_a, party_a_principal, party_b, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date,approval_start_date, approval_end_date, summary, terms, file_url, group_id,company_id, is_draft, summation, create_id, create_time, effective_time, termination_time, attachment1_name, attachment1, attachment2_name, attachment2, attachment3_name, attachment3, attachment4_name, attachment4, attachment5_name, attachment5 from t_contract
mapper.update: update t_contract set approval_status = #{arg2}, approval_end_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where contract_id = #{arg0} and company_id = #{arg1}
